title: FIFA 17
body:
FIFA 17


Genres/Tags: Sports, Soccer, Third-person, 3D
Companies: EA Canada / Electronic Arts
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI18
Original Size: 39.3 GB
Repack Size: from 17.8 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only] MULTi11 Commentaries
  • RuTor [magnet] ENG/RUS Commentaries Only
  • FreeTorrents ENG/RUS Commentaries Only
  • Tapochek.net [magnet] ENG/RUS Commentaries Only
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2] MULTi11 Commentaries

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on FIFA.17-STEAMPUNKS ISO release: stp-fifa17.iso (36,669,364,224 bytes)
  • Missing language files added (5.1 GB). Many thanks to ahmadmob for providing access to needed Origin files
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • Updated squads data included. Once in game, go to Customize > Profile > Load Squads. If you want to start a career with updated squad, be sure to select Current Customized squad
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of commentary files you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 39.3 to 17.8~29.7 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~45 minutes on 8-cores CPU; ~1 hour 20 minutes on 4-cores CPU; up to 2 hours on 2-cores CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 42 GB (up to 70 GB during installation)
  • You can change the game GUI language on each launch; commentary language can be changed later in game based on langpacks you’ve installed
  • Video and audio settings can be changed via Config icon, placed on desktop
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Powered by Frostbite, FIFA 17 transforms the way you play, compete and emotionally connect with the game.

FIFA 17 immerses you in authentic football experiences by leveraging the sophistication of a new game engine, while introducing you to football players full of depth and emotion, and taking you to brand new worlds accessible only in the game. Complete innovation in the way players think and move, physically interact with opponents, and execute in attack lets you own every moment on the pitch.

You can skip downloading of commentary packs you don’t need. Here is the list of selective files. Note, that “The Journey” mode dubbing is available only in English and included in main files by default.

  • setup-fitgirl-selective-english.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-russian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-arabic.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-brazilian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-dutch.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-french.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-german.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-italian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-mexican.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-polish.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective” files, but download setup-fitgirl-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-04).
